content: Anyway, <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, please take this <style=Highlight>{秘方}</style> to keep, mhm.

content: Shape the rice dough into a Daikabutomaru, add some of Daikabutomaru's favorite fruits as filling, and you'll get Isaki's original <style=Highlight>{菜肴}</style>!
